name: Performance Profiler
author: Nevma.gr

sections.description:
Performance Profiler

WordPress Performance Profiler plugin silently monitors the resources consumption in the backend and frontend of your WordPress installation in order to provide overall usage and load statistics for optimization and debugging purposes.
sections.installation:
Usual process

  1. Install the plugin via “Plugins > Add New”.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Go to its settings and save them!

The plugin should simply work!

De-activate the plugin to disable it. Activate the plugin to enable it. Delete it and it's gone. So simple.
sections.faq:
How heavy is the plugin itself

Well, not much really, but it is designed to be useful in non-production environments or, if used in production, to be
enabled only for certain periods of time, in order to collect usage data.

short_description: Performance Profiler plugin silently monitors the resources consumption of your WordPress installation.
